messages.message: Not sure if this is frontend issue -  https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1752518734595029

I'm able to reproduce on aihub-sandbox but not locally.

Looks like this network request is hanging
• `solutions/deployed/jobs`
If you open the network panel before navigating to that page, are you seeing the same thing?
Yeah, I see the same thing.
Weirdly enough, if the request is hanging, the page shouldn’t be unresponsive. I have a feeling we have a frontend infinite loop somewhere, or it’s just a really heavy schema being loaded
@Sherif what app are you using to replicate the issue on aihub-sandbox?

@Paul H I made an app without case-fields to see if it was related to the changes I made to human review.

https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/build/01975c5c-241b-7f32-9403-a4c787a1e57e

@Abhishek Adupa when loading human-review via the UI are there any backend logs related to that endpoint?

Or for this `/api/v1/flow_binary/get_schema` ? I added some logs to the frontend code and it seems like thats where it hangs
Sorry missed this - No @Sherif there are no errors on backend, even aroung ‘/get_schema’
